stepAnswer: In the year $$2005$$ there are $$300$$ police officers in the town.
stepTitle: A function N $$=$$ f(y) gives the number of police officers, N, in a town in year $$y$$. What does f(2005) $$=$$ $$300$$ represent?
answerLatex: In the year $$2005$$ there are $$300$$ police officers in the town.
choices: In the year $$2005$$ there are $$300$$ police officers in the town.
In the year $$2005$$ there are $$300$$ more police officers in the town than in the previous year.
In $$300$$ years there will be $$2005$$ police officers in the town.
